mapper.insert: insert into company (idx, name, add1, add2, postcode, eco, roomtype, theme, areacode, detailcode, latitude, longitude) values (company_idx_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{add1}, #{add2}, #{postcode}, #{eco}, #{roomtype}, #{theme}, #{areacode}, #{detailcode}, #{latitude}, #{longitude})
mapper.update: update company set name=#{name}, eco=#{eco}, roomtype=#{roomtype}, theme=#{theme}, add1=#{add1}, add2=#{add2} where idx=#{idx}
